description: Export clumps to geometry sets for post-processing or STL export. If no range is specified, all clumps in the model are exported. Currently only supports export to geometry sets. Clumps with surface descriptions will use those surfaces; otherwise, a geometrical representation of each pebble is exported.

geometry_keywords.name: set
geometry_keywords.description: Geometry set base name (default: 'set'). With 'split', creates sets named '<s>_clump<id>' for each clump. Without 'split', all clumps exported to one set with name <s>. Existing geometry objects in the set are not deleted (unless using split, which overrides existing sets with same name)

geometry_keywords.name: resolution
geometry_keywords.description: Facet edge resolution factor for pebble representations. Edge length < f * R where R is the ball radius (default: 0.25)

geometry_keywords.name: split
geometry_keywords.description: Export each clump to dedicated geometry set (default: all clumps in one set). When specified, each clump is exported into a set named '<basename>_clump<id>'. Existing sets with the same name are overridden

geometry_keywords.name: surfaces
geometry_keywords.description: If set to true, clump surface descriptions will be exported (when available) in place of a geometric representation of the clump pebbles. Default: true

notes: Clumps with surface descriptions use those surfaces when exported (if surfaces=true)
Clumps without surface descriptions export geometrical representation of each pebble
Geometry sets can be exported as STL files for use in third-party CAD software
With split keyword: existing sets with same name are overridden
Without split keyword: existing geometry objects in the set are not deleted

examples.description: Export all clumps as geometry to default set 'set'. Uses surface descriptions when available, otherwise exports pebbles with default resolution 0.25
Export clumps with higher resolution (0.1) for pebble representations to geometry set 'clumps'
Export each clump to separate geometry set (e.g., 'rock_clump1', 'rock_clump2'). Existing sets with same names are overridden

examples.command: clump export geometry surfaces false resolution 0.5
examples.description: Force export of pebble geometries (ignore surface descriptions) with coarser triangulation (0.5)

examples.command: clump export geometry set 'assembly' range group 'aggregate'
examples.description: Export only clumps in 'aggregate' group to single geometry set 'assembly'

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('clump export geometry ...') - no Python SDK equivalent for geometry export
